ca.ualberta.cs.unter.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.unter.controller.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    User model's controller, a glue between Activity and Model. Give access for activity(View) to modify and update model.
